import React from 'react' import './Coin.css' const Coin = ({image,name,price,volume,pricechange,marketcap}) => { return (

{name}

Rs.{price}

{pricechange<0 ? (

{pricechange.toFixed(2)}%

):(

{pricechange.toFixed(2)}%

) }

Mkt Cap: Rs.{marketcap.toLocaleString()}

) } export default Coin
